00024 template<typename C, size_t PS = (64 - 12)> class QString {
00025         public:         enum { npos = 0x7FFFFFFF };
00026         public:         typedef size_t size_type;
00027         public:         typedef C value_type;
00028         public:         template<typename E, class Q> class _iterator;
00029         public:         typedef _iterator<C, QString<C, PS> > iterator;
00030         public:         typedef _iterator<const C, const QString<C, PS> > const_iterator;
00031         public:         class Buffer;
00032         public:         typedef std::reverse_iterator<iterator> reverse_iterator;
00033         public:         typedef std::reverse_iterator<const_iterator> const_reverse_iterator;

00046         public:         C operator[](size_type index) const;
00047         public:         const C& at(size_type index) const;
00048         public:         C& at(size_type index);

00068         public:         const_iterator end() const { return const_iterator(pointer + length, this); }
00069         public:         iterator begin() { unshare(); return iterator(pointer, this); }
00070         public:         iterator end() { unshare(); return iterator(pointer + length, this); }
00071         public:         const_reverse_iterator rbegin() const { return const_reverse_iterator(end()); }
00072         public:         const_reverse_iterator rend() const { return const_reverse_iterator(begin()); }
00073         public:         reverse_iterator rbegin() { unshare(); return reverse_iterator(end()); }
00074         public:         reverse_iterator rend() { unshare(); return reverse_iterator(begin()); }
00075         public:         operator std::basic_string<C>() const { return std::basic_string<C>(pointer, length); }

00083         protected:      C* pointer;

00089 /* --- Implementation --- */
00090 
00091 template<> inline void QString<char>::copychars(char* d, const char* s, size_t l) { memcpy(d, s, l); }
00092 template<> inline void QString<wchar_t>::copychars(wchar_t* d, const wchar_t* s, size_t l) { wmemcpy(d, s, l); }
00093 
00094 template<typename C, size_t PS> class QString<C, PS>::Buffer {
00095         friend class QString<C, PS>;
00096         protected:      static Buffer*& obtainPoolHead() { static Buffer* poolHead; return poolHead; }
00097 
00098         public:         Buffer(size_type n) : rc(1), size(n > PS ? n : PS), chars(n > PS ? new C[n] : internal) { };
00099         public:         ~Buffer() { if (chars != internal) delete [] chars; }
00100         
00101         public:         static void* operator new(size_t count) {
00102                                         assert(count == sizeof (Buffer));
00103                                         Buffer* h = obtainPoolHead();
00104                                         if (h == 0) h = reinterpret_cast<Buffer*>(::operator new(count));
00105                                         else obtainPoolHead() = obtainPoolHead()->next;
00106                                         return h;
00107                                 }
00108                                 
00109         public:         static void operator delete(void* pointer) throw() {
00110                                         Buffer* h = reinterpret_cast<Buffer*>(pointer);
00111                                         h->next = obtainPoolHead();
00112                                         obtainPoolHead() = h;
00113                                 }
00114                                 
00115         public:         static void cleanPool() throw() {
00116                                         while (obtainPoolHead() != 0) {
00117                                                 Buffer* h = obtainPoolHead();
00118                                                 obtainPoolHead() = h->next;
00119                                                 ::operator delete(h);
00120                                         }
00121                                 }
00122                                 
00123         protected:      union {
00124                                         struct {
00125                                                 C internal[PS];
00126                                                 int rc;
00127                                                 size_type size;
00128                                                 C* chars;
00129                                         };
00130                                         Buffer* next;
00131                                 };
00132 };
00133 
00134 template<typename C, size_t PS> void QString<C, PS>::retain() const throw() { ++buffer->rc; }
00135 template<typename C, size_t PS> void QString<C, PS>::deinit() throw() { Buffer::cleanPool(); }
00136 template<typename C, size_t PS> typename QString<C, PS>::size_type QString<C, PS>::size() const { return length; }
00137 template<typename C, size_t PS> bool QString<C, PS>::empty() const { return (length == 0); }
00138 template<typename C, size_t PS> const C* QString<C, PS>::data() const { return pointer; }

00140 template<typename C, size_t PS> template<typename E, class Q> class QString<C, PS>::_iterator
00141                 : public std::iterator<std::random_access_iterator_tag, E> { // FIX : is there some good base-class for this in STL?
00142         friend class QString;
00143         public:         _iterator() : p(0), s(0) { }
00144         public:         template<typename E2, class Q2> _iterator(const _iterator<E2, Q2>& copy) : p(copy.p), s(copy.s) { }
00145         protected:      explicit _iterator(E* p, Q* s) : p(p), s(s) { }
00146         public:         friend _iterator operator+(const _iterator& it, ptrdiff_t d) { return _iterator(it.p + d, it.s); }
00147         public:         friend _iterator operator+(ptrdiff_t d, const _iterator& it) { return _iterator(it.p + d, it.s); }
00148         public:         friend _iterator operator-(const _iterator& it, ptrdiff_t d) { return _iterator(it.p - d, it.s); }
00149         public:         friend ptrdiff_t operator-(const _iterator& a, const _iterator& b) {
00150                                         assert(a.s == b.s);
00151                                         return a.p - b.p;
00152                                 }
00153         public:         _iterator& operator+=(ptrdiff_t d) { p += d; return (*this); }
00154         public:         _iterator& operator-=(ptrdiff_t d) { p -= d; return (*this); }
00155         public:         _iterator& operator++() { ++p; return (*this); }
00156         public:         _iterator& operator--() { --p; return (*this); }
00157         public:         const _iterator operator++(int) { _iterator copy(*this); ++p; return copy; }
00158         public:         const _iterator operator--(int) { _iterator copy(*this); ++p; return copy; }
00159         public:         template<typename E2, class Q2> _iterator& operator=(const _iterator<E2, Q2>& copy) {
00160                                         p = copy.p;
00161                                         s = copy.s;
00162                                         return (*this);
00163                                 }
00164         public:         template<typename E2, class Q2> bool operator<(const _iterator<E2, Q2>& r) const {
00165                                         assert(r.s == s);
00166                                         return (p < r.p);
00167                                 }
00168         public:         template<typename E2, class Q2> bool operator<=(const _iterator<E2, Q2>& r) const {
00169                                         assert(r.s == s);
00170                                         return (p <= r.p);
00171                                 }
00172         public:         template<typename E2, class Q2> bool operator==(const _iterator<E2, Q2>& r) const {
00173                                         return (p == r.p);
00174                                 }
00175         public:         template<typename E2, class Q2> bool operator!=(const _iterator<E2, Q2>& r) const {
00176                                         return (p != r.p);
00177                                 }
00178         public:         template<typename E2, class Q2> bool operator>=(const _iterator<E2, Q2>& r) const {
00179                                         assert(r.s == s);
00180                                         return (p >= r.p);
00181                                 }
00182         public:         template<typename E2, class Q2> bool operator>(const _iterator<E2, Q2>& r) const {
00183                                         assert(r.s == s);
00184                                         return (p > r.p);
00185                                 }
00186         public:         E& operator*() const { assert(s->data() <= p && p < s->data() + s->size()); return *p; }
00187         public:         E& operator[](ptrdiff_t d) const { return *((*this) + d); }
00188         public:         E* p;
00189         public:         Q* s;
00190 };

00192 template<typename C, size_t PS> template<size_t N> QString<C, PS>::QString(const C (&s)[N])
00193                 : pointer(const_cast<C*>(s)), length(N - 1), buffer(obtainDummyBuffer()) {
00194         retain();
00195 }

00197 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>::QString() : length(0), buffer(obtainDummyBuffer()) {
00198         pointer = buffer->chars;
00199         retain();
00200 }
00201 template<typename C, size_t PS> typename QString<C, PS>::Buffer* QString<C, PS>::obtainDummyBuffer() {
00202         static typename QString<C, PS>::Buffer dummy(0);
00203         return &dummy;
00204 }
00205 
00206 template<typename C, size_t PS> void QString<C, PS>::release() throw() {
00207         assert(buffer->rc >= 1);
00208         if (--buffer->rc == 0) delete buffer;
00209 }
00210 
00211 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>::~QString() throw() { release(); }
00212 
00213 template<typename C, size_t PS> void QString<C, PS>::newBuffer(size_type l, const C* b, size_type extra) {
00214         buffer = new Buffer(l + extra + 1);
00215         pointer = buffer->chars;
00216         length = l;
00217         copychars(pointer, b, l);
00218         pointer[length] = 0;
00219 }
00220 
00221 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>::QString(C* s) { newBuffer(std::char_traits<C>::length(s), s); }
00222 
00223 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>::QString(const C* b, size_type l, size_type extra) {
00224         newBuffer(l, b, extra);
00225 }
00226 
00227 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>::QString(size_type n, C c) {
00228         newBuffer(0, 0, n);
00229         std::fill(pointer, pointer + n, c);
00230         length = n;
00231 }

00233 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>::QString(const QString& copy)
00234                 : pointer(copy.pointer), length(copy.length), buffer(copy.buffer) {
00235         retain();
00236 }

00238 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>::QString(const_iterator b, const_iterator e)
00239                 : pointer(const_cast<C*>(b.p)), length(e.p - b.p), buffer(b.s->buffer) {
00240         assert(b.s->begin() <= b && b <= b.s->end());
00241         assert(b <= e && e <= b.s->end());
00242         retain();
00243 }
00244 
00245 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>::QString(const C* b, const C* e) {
00246         assert(b <= e);
00247         newBuffer(e - b, b);
00248 }
00249 
00250 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>::QString(const std::basic_string<C>& copy) {
00251         newBuffer(copy.size(), copy.data());
00252 }

00254 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>::QString(const QString& copy, size_type offset, size_type count)
00255                 : pointer(copy.pointer + offset), length(count < copy.length - offset ? count : copy.length - offset), buffer(copy.buffer) {
00256         assert((!std::numeric_limits<size_type>::is_signed || offset >= 0) && offset <= copy.length);
00257         retain();
00258 }

00260 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>& QString<C, PS>::operator=(const QString<C, PS>& copy) {
00261         copy.retain();
00262         this->release();
00263         this->pointer = copy.pointer;
00264         this->length = copy.length;
00265         this->buffer = copy.buffer;
00266         return (*this);
00267 }
00268 
00269 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>& QString<C, PS>::append(const C* p, size_type l) {
00270         bool fit = (pointer + length + l < buffer->chars + buffer->size);
00271         if (buffer->rc != 1 && fit && memcmp(pointer + length, p, l) == 0) {
00272                 length += l;
00273                 return (*this);
00274         }
00275         if (buffer->rc != 1 || !fit) {
00276                 (*this) = QString(pointer, length, l + (length < 65536 ? length : 65536)); // FIX : constant
00277         }
00278         copychars(pointer + length, p, l);
00279         length += l;
00280         assert(buffer->rc == 1);
00281         pointer[length] = 0;
00282         return (*this);
00283 }
00284 
00285 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS> QString<C, PS>::concat(const C* p, size_type l) const {
00286         QString copy(pointer, length, l + (l < size_type(65536) ? l : size_type(65536)));
00287         copychars(copy.pointer + copy.length, p, l);
00288         copy.length += l;
00289         assert(copy.buffer->rc == 1);
00290         copy.pointer[copy.length] = 0;
00291         return copy;
00292 }

00294 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>& QString<C, PS>::operator+=(const QString<C, PS>& s) {
00295         return (length == 0) ? (*this = s) : append(s.pointer, s.length);
00296 }

00298 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS> QString<C, PS>::operator+(const QString<C, PS>& s) const {
00299         return (length == 0) ? s : concat(s.pointer, s.length);
00300 }

00302 template<typename C, size_t PS> template<size_t N> QString<C, PS>& QString<C, PS>::operator+=(const C (&s)[N]) {
00303         return append(s, N - 1);

00306 template<typename C, size_t PS> template<size_t N> QString<C, PS> QString<C, PS>::operator+(const C (&s)[N]) const {
00307         return concat(s, N - 1);

00310 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS>& QString<C, PS>::operator+=(C c) { return append(&c, 1); }
00311 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS> QString<C, PS>::operator+(C c) const { return concat(&c, 1); }

00313 template<typename C, size_t PS> void QString<C, PS>::unshare() const {
00314         if (buffer->rc != 1) *const_cast<QString<C, PS>*>(this) = QString(pointer, length);
00315 }
00316 
00317 template<typename C, size_t PS> const C* QString<C, PS>::c_str() const {
00318         if (*(pointer + length) != 0) {
00319                 unshare();
00320                 *(pointer + length) = 0;
00321         }
00322         return pointer;
00323 }

00325 template<typename C, size_t PS> QString<C, PS> QString<C, PS>::substr(size_type offset, size_type count) const {
00326         return QString(*this, offset, count);
00327 }

00329 template<typename C, size_t PS> C QString<C, PS>::operator[](size_type index) const {
00330         assert((!std::numeric_limits<size_type>::is_signed || 0 <= index) && index <= length);
00331         return (index == length) ? 0 : pointer[index];
00332 }
00333 
00334 template<typename C, size_t PS> const C& QString<C, PS>::at(size_type index) const {
00335         assert((!std::numeric_limits<size_type>::is_signed || 0 <= index) && index < length);
00336         return pointer[index];
00337 }
00338 
00339 template<typename C, size_t PS> C& QString<C, PS>::at(size_type index) {
00340         assert(0 <= index && index < length);
00341         unshare();
00342         return pointer[index];
00343 }

00345 template<typename C, size_t PS> bool QString<C, PS>::operator<(const QString<C, PS>& r) const {
00346         int d = (this->pointer == r.pointer ? 0 : std::char_traits<C>::compare
00347                         (this->pointer, r.pointer, (this->length < r.length ? this->length : r.length)));
00348         return (d == 0 ? (this->length < r.length) : (d < 0));
00349 }
00350 
00351 template<typename C, size_t PS> bool QString<C, PS>::operator<=(const QString<C, PS>& r) const {
00352         int d = (this->pointer == r.pointer ? 0 : std::char_traits<C>::compare
00353                         (this->pointer, r.pointer, (this->length < r.length ? this->length : r.length)));
00354         return (d == 0 ? (this->length <= r.length) : (d < 0));
00355 }
00356 
00357 template<typename C, size_t PS> bool QString<C, PS>::operator==(const QString<C, PS>& r) const {
00358         return (this->length == r.length && (this->pointer == r.pointer
00359                         || std::char_traits<C>::compare(this->pointer, r.pointer, this->length) == 0));
00360 }
00361 
00362 template<typename C, size_t PS> bool QString<C, PS>::operator!=(const QString<C, PS>& r) const { return !(*this == r); }
00363 template<typename C, size_t PS> bool QString<C, PS>::operator>=(const QString<C, PS>& r) const { return !(*this < r); }
00364 template<typename C, size_t PS> bool QString<C, PS>::operator>(const QString<C, PS>& r) const { return !(*this <= r); }
